channel.title: ISkape 317. First release! *Old hitsplats! MUST SEE
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Sk ISkape 317 Delta. First Release! [/size] Download Client & Source - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?d7nuqq9hv95v5d5]http://www.mediafire.com/?d7nuqq9hv95v5d5[/url] Message me if the links are down.[/b][/center] [center][b][size=14pt]& Comment to keep it alive.[/size][/b][/center] [center][b]Tell me if the client doesn't work as well & I'll be sure to fix it.[/b][/center]
[b]Perfect combat & pking[/b] -Range works fine. -Magic & Melee works good. [b]Just found out only the Dragon Dagger that works is the one with the (s) Item Id - 5698 you can just find the item id 5698 and use the same code for all dds.[/b] -500 exp per hit -Guards & men all around to train on. [b]Items & their bonuses[/b] -773- Perfect ring does not give bonuses! [b]Good stability All Prayers work.[/b] Piety & the other one was added, but you can delete it. [b][s]Npc clipping[/s] Uploaded source and client are old versions and do not contain anymore. Around 5 quests[/b] Quest's start finished, change the player's quest to start to 1 not 15. 1. Not started *Red 2-14. In progress *Yellow 15. Done *Green [b]All regular magic spells work! All ancient magick spells work! Blood barrage absorbs their hp to yours. Old 317 Gameframe Old 194 or 289 hitsplats! Deleted godswords. Nothing newer than 317+ Some member only features. Lots of shops around the map[/b] -General store in Falador Lumby Varrock & Catherby -Varrock Armor Weapon Runes Clothe stores -Falador Shield Haircuttery stores -Lumby Axe store & such. [b]Guild requirements[/b] -Mining guild [b]Commands are only for staff.[/b] ::Pickup (Item id) (Quantity) ::Npc (Npc id) ::Refresh ::Tele (Cord x) (Cord y) ::Barrage -Ice barrage ::Blood -Blood barrage -lots more check out client.java & search commands [b]Finished catherby, falador, varrock & lumby.[/b] [b]Skilling[/b] [i]-Thieving[/i] thieve men until 20 then use stalls. [i]-Mining -Smithing -Woodcutting[/i] must equipt the axe. [i]-Firemaking[/i] Stays in same spot due to clipping glitches. [i]-Fletching -Fishing -Cooking [/i] Cook the food you fished in catherby. [i]-Prayer[/i] Kill monsters & bury their bones. Pray at lumbridge's prayer altar.
[center][b]THIS SERVER IS FOR NEW CODERS TO PRACTICE & IT IS NOT DONE. YOU NEED TO CODE MORE NPCS TO TRAIN ON INSTEAD OF MEN & GUARDS. YOU NEED TO FIX MINOR GLITCHES & YOU NEED TO MAKE THE ECONOMY AS MONSTERS DONT DROP ANYTHING YET.[/b]
[b]CREDITS[/b] Lugmfr for the base & such. Me for the stuff you just read. - I dont include percentages because I'm not sure how much he really contributed making his server depending me as well.
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/starting.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/Workingdds.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/pking.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/ancientsandbloodwork.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/woodcutting.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/trade.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/Theiving.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/theive3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/smithing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/mining.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/miningguid.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/shops.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/pm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/friends.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/fishing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/firemaking.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/emote.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/eating.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/cooking.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/rsps/clipping.png[/img]
[b]CREDITS[/b] Lugmfr for the base & such. Me for the stuff you just read. - I dont include percentages because I'm not sure how much he really contributed making his server depending me as well. [b]Download Client & Source - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?d7nuqq9hv95v5d5]http://www.mediafire.com/?d7nuqq9hv95v5d5[/url][/b] [/center]
[center][b][size=24pt]Please Comment if you're gonna use this, or at least give Constructive criticism. [/size][/center]

item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

EndlessKarma:

I can’t compile, how do I do thattt!@?

You need JDK, and you need to change the current version in the compiler to your version. BTW, do not use the downloads thread to ask for help. Use the server help board as this has nothing to do with the source

Read full topic
